binding:binding.name: LG webOS Binding
binding:binding.description: Binding to connect LG's WebOS based smart TVs based on Connect SDK
binding:binding.author: Sebastian Prehn

parameter.name: localIP
parameter.label: Local IP
parameter.description: Local IP of server network interface to bind to. This is optional. If not set, the binding will use openHAB's primary IP address, which may be configured under network settings.
